metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10360 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
The do_core_note function in readelf.c in libmagic.a in file 5.33 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via a crafted ELF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10360` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

file - 1:5.14-2ubuntu3.4
libmagic1 - 1:5.14-2ubuntu3.4
python-magic - 1:5.14-2ubuntu3.4
python3-magic - 1:5.14-2ubuntu3.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: file package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.14-2ubuntu3.4').
